charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] went to the forest to
see Adaman, who had a favor to ask.
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1101_0200_2:
When [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] arrived, Adaman and Leafeon were
already at the meeting spot.
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_0400_1: There’s no time to waste, so I’ll cut to the chase.
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_0401_0700_1:
Yeah! I’m asking both you and your
partner Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_0402_0900_1:
I’d be happy if you yourself would also be
his playmate.
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_1000_1:
I decided to put Leafeon inside one of Pasio’s
Poké Balls, but...
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_1100_1:
Back in Hisui, we were always hanging out
together without a Poké Ball, so it feels a
little strange.
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_1200_1: It seems he feels the same way, too.
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_1300_1:
Rather than staying in his Poké Ball, Leafeon
prefers to roam freely.
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_1400_1:
That’s why I wanted to ask you to be
his playmate.
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_0301_1500_1: In that case, I’d be happy to!
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_0302_1700_1:
You care a lot about your
partner Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_0402_1800_1: I’m not doing anything special, really.
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_1900_1: That said...even though technology has evolved...
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_2000_1: Poké Balls really do connect people and Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_2100_1:
In my era, there were some people who used
Poké Balls to help people and Pokémon coexist.
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_2200_1:
At first, I thought it was strange...but it seems to
be the norm here in the future.
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_2300_1: Using Poké Balls to coexist with Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_2400_1:
is something that I now know will be a good
change for Hisui. Coming to Pasio taught me that.
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_2500_1:
Now that I’ve seen all the different sync pairs and
have become one myself...
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_2600_1:
I want to confidently recommend Poké Ball use to
the naysayers in Hisui.
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_2700_1: That’s why we need to get used to it, too.
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_2800_1:
Oh, and also... There’s another thing that’s
common in this world too, right?
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_0401_3000_1: You know what I’m talking about!
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_0402_3200_1: Yeah! I like how quick you are to understand!
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_3300_1:
Pokémon battles are necessary to strengthen the
bonds of sync pairs...correct?
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_3400_1:
If I can teach others about the things we learned
here when we return to our era, that will
accelerate the flow of time in Hisui!
charaepi_ch0284_00_seki/2301_1201_3500_1:
After we play with Leafeon and finish
our warm-up...
